title: The skills needed to facilitate a rural innovation platform

tasks.task: Identify required skills for working in an innovation system related to livestock production and agriculture.
subtasks: Understanding the importance of livestock production and animal husbandry skills.
Recognizing the significance of facilitation skills in an innovation system.
Acknowledging the value of knowledge management in agricultural innovation.
Emphasizing the importance of teamwork and team-building abilities.
Highlighting the importance of planning in the agricultural sector.
Stressing the importance of documenting lessons learned from agricultural projects.
Noting the need for technical skills specific to one's area of specialization in agriculture.
Understanding the importance of developing social skills (e.g., facilitation, team building) beyond formal education.
